intent: Describe the objective of the work being continued, not the reason for the interruption.

established: Concepts, decisions, or conclusions already fixed and not under debate
open_questions: Unresolved questions or areas requiring further work
blocked_items: Explicit blockers (missing info, dependencies, deliberate pauses)

handoff_point.resume_from: The last stable semantic boundary, not a conversational turn
handoff_point.next_expected_action: The single next action required to advance the work

notes: Optional. Contextual remarks that do not alter intent, state, or constraints.
